## Primitive.setBoundingVolume() method

Sets the bounding volume of the primitive

**Signature:**


|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  bv | [BoundingVolume](doc/markdown/./scene.boundingvolume.md) | The bounding volume to be set |
